Human Services Data Specification (HSDS)
  • Home

  • API Definition
  • Contact

Human Services Data Specification (HSDS) Schema - HTML

This is the schema for the HSDS format. It is available as an HTML list, JSON schema, as well as a YAML version of the schema, for different uses. If you are looking for a machine readable definition for the HSDS API, there is a separate OpenAPI Spec available for the project.

There Are A Handful Of Ways To Engage:
  • HTML Outline (current)
  • JSON Schema
  • YAML Schema
  • Discussion
Human Services Data Specification (HSDS) Schema

organization

  • id (string)
  • name (string)
  • alternate_name (string)
  • description (string)
  • email (string)
  • url (string)
  • tax_status (string)
  • tax_id (string)
  • year_incorporated (date)
  • legal_status (string)

program

  • id (string)
  • organization_id (string)
  • name (string)
  • alternate_name (string)

service

  • id (string)
  • organization_id (string)
  • program_id (string)
  • location_id (string)
  • name (string)
  • alternate_name (string)
  • url (string)
  • email (string)
  • status (string)
  • application_process (string)
  • wait_time (string)

service_at_location

  • id (string)
  • location_id (string)
  • url (string)
  • email (string)

location

  • id (string)
  • organization_id (string)
  • name (string)
  • alternate_name (string)
  • transportation (string)
  • latitude (float)
  • longitude (float)

phone

  • id (string)
  • location_id (string)
  • service_id (string)
  • organization_id (string)
  • contact_id (string)
  • number (string)
  • extension (number)
  • type (string)
  • department (string)

contact

  • id (string)
  • organization_id (string)
  • service_id (string)
  • name (string)
  • title (string)
  • department (string)
  • email (string)

physical_address

  • id (string)
  • location_id (string)
  • attention (string)
  • address_1 (string)
  • address_2 (string)
  • address_3 (string)
  • address_4 (string)
  • city (string)
  • state_province (string)
  • postal_code (string)
  • country (string)

postal_address

  • id (string)
  • location_id (string)
  • attention (string)
  • address_1 (string)
  • address_2 (string)
  • address_3 (string)
  • address_4 (string)
  • city (string)
  • state_province (string)
  • postal_code (string)
  • country (string)

regular_schedule

  • id (string)
  • service_id (string)
  • location_id (string)
  • weekday (integer)
  • opens_at (time)
  • closes_at (time)

holiday_schedule

  • id (string)
  • service_id (string)
  • location_id (string)
  • closed (boolean)
  • opens_at (time)
  • closes_at (time)
  • start_date (date)
  • end_date (date)

funding

  • id (string)
  • organization_id (string)
  • service_id (string)
  • source (string)

eligibility

  • id (string)
  • service_id (string)
  • eligibility (string)

service_area

  • id (string)
  • service_id (string)
  • service_area (string)

required_document

  • id (string)
  • service_id (string)
  • document (string)

fee

  • id (string)
  • service_id (string)
  • fee (string)

payment_accepted

  • id (string)
  • service_id (string)
  • payment (string)

intepretation_services

  • id (string)
  • service_id (string)
  • language (string)

language

  • id (string)
  • service_id (string)
  • location_id (string)
  • language (string)

accessibility_for_disabilities

  • id (string)
  • location_id (string)
  • accessibility (string)

metadata

  • id (string)
  • resource_id (string)
  • last_action_date (string)
  • last_action_type (string)
  • field_name (string)
  • previous_value (string)
  • replacement_value (string)
  • updated_by (string)

meta_table_description

  • id (string)
  • name (string)
  • language (string)
  • character_set (string)
